requirements.summary: Remove the “Built with … using caffeine.ai” attribution block (heart icon + external link) from the footer while leaving all other footer content unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer renders the attribution paragraph containing the text “Built with” / “using” and the “caffeine.ai” link.
No other footer content is removed or changed (copyright and disclaimer remain visible and unchanged).
There is no remaining visible “caffeine.ai” branding text/link anywhere in the app UI.

file_operations.description:
Remove the attribution

that contains “Built with … using caffeine.ai”, including the Heart icon and external caffeine.ai link; also remove any now-unused variables/imports (e.g., Heart import and appIdentifier) while keeping the copyright and disclaimer blocks unchanged.
